document_data.caption: Mwaxanaré and her brother [[Na]]
document_data.name: Mwaxanaré
document_data.mainbody: '''Mwaxanaré''' ({{Pronounce|muh|WOX|eh|nah|ray|refs=}}) was the princess of the fallen kingdom of [[Omu]] in [[Chult]]. Along with her brother [[Na]], she came to live with the [[aarakocra]] in the cliffside sanctuary [[Kir Sabal]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality:
Like one of [[Zalkoré|her ancestors]], Mwaxanaré was vain and rather headstrong. Her upbringing left her with an entitled disposition and ill-informed worldview. She believed all the vassals of the [[Sword Coast]] and [[Chult]] were servants to her royal decree.

Despite her self-serving nature, the princess was quite lonely. The only other human she knew was her brother, who was still a young boy as of their residence in Kir Sabal.
document_data.Relationships:
Mwaxanaré was the daughter of [[Razaan]] and [[Omek]], as well as the sister of Prince Na. She was a descendant of [[Napaka]], the last queen of Omu, and [[Zalkoré]], the former queen who was transformed into a [[medusa]].

The aged leader of Kir Sabal, [[Asharra]], served as the princess' teacher.
document_data.History:
After their parents died, Mwaxanaré and Na were taken in by the aarakocra of Kir Sabal. While they treated her well, the aarakocra cared for the young royals in the hopes of garnering favor with the restored kingdom of Omu.

Against Asharra's direction, Mwaxanaré formed a pact with the [[Wind Dukes of Aaqa]] to gain [[magic]]al abilities.
